text: Maura Forte (born 1 November 1959 in Villata) is an Italian politician. She is a member of the Democratic Party and she was elected Mayor of Vercelli on 8 June 2014 and took his office on 11 June. Forte ran for a second term at the 2019 local elections, but lost at the second round to former mayor Andrea Corsaro. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Vercelli ==External links== * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Vercelli Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Maura Forte
